name: Portraits In Portraits in The Park
name_original: Portraits In Portraits in The Park
description:
Click on the title screen to begin.

Photos are graciously provided by Ryan Pfluger. They are from his Portraits In the Park series which you can find here.

Music is Vivaldi's "Spring" recomposed by Max Richter. Listen to it all on Spotify here.

This protoype was made in a week for Bennett Foddy's Prototype Studio class at the NYU Game Center.
